properties.description: The space is free, welcoming and open to all. Regular free events for all ages.
properties.title: Callington Library

properties.address: The Zone, Downderry Methodist Church, Torpoint, Cornwall PL11 3JZ
properties.description: On a Monday afternoon 2pm-4pm you can have a go at a craft or just join us for a cuppa & a chat. Wednesday mornings 10am-12noon we offer companionship,quizzes & a variety of table games. Wednesday evening at 6pm there is the opportunity to play table tennis-no experience needed & all equipment provided. During school holidays we run activities for primary school aged children & their parents.We also run term time activities.
properties.title: Deviock Activities Group at the Zone, Downderry

properties.address: Landrake Methodist Church, Landrake, Cornwall PL12 5EA
properties.description: A lovely, safe, warm space where we gather for a Community Cafe 9-12 every Wednesday morning. Plus crafts, art, music and other activities throughout the month.
properties.title: Landrake Chapel Community Hub

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 14th November 2023** Our Warm Space is held in our community room/council chambers, which is on the first floor of our building.
properties.title: Looe Library & Community Hub

properties.address: Looe Library & Community Hub, Looe, Cornwall PL13 2AF
properties.description: A relaxed environment with seating with free hot drinks & snacks, soups and porridge. Plus a friendly face to sit and have a chat with.
properties.title: Looe Library & Community Hub

properties.address: Polperro Methodist Chapel, 62 Fore Streert, Polperro, Cornwall PL13 2QR
properties.description: A very warm welcome awaits everyone at our beautiful chapel in the heart of Polperro. Our cosy room with a sunny balcony overlooking the streets of this pretty coastal village buzzes with laughter and camaraderie.
properties.title: Polperro Methodist Chapel

properties.description: We provide a safe space for local people, giving an opportunity to meet with others, have coffee, spiritual activities in a flexible atmosphere.
